highlights: Greetings button on character details tab fixed

improvements.title: Customization Tab
improvements.description: The entire customization modal was broken when entering a chat, only way to fix it was to restart.

improvements.title: Greetings Button
improvements.description: When the character's name had spaces, it would never find the greetings information due to using the visual name instead of the folder name for directory search

improvements.title: Websockets (again)
improvements.description: Even more parts of the app now use a local server instead of websockets, the main advantage is the increased file size (1-10mb websockets vs 100mb servers), character loading also first only gets the metadata, to further reduce chances of large file payloads crashing the app.
